author: cbs8
title: Device Enhances Golfing Convenience - Designed by InventHelp Client (RGL-103)
text:
InventHelp, one of America's leading invention companies, is submitting the HANDY RAN PCS to companies for their review.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 24, 2015
An inventor from Prentice, Wis., wants to enhance convenience for golfers. "While golfing in the early morning there is dew on the ground," he said, "so we’d lean our golf clubs on golf tees to keep them from getting wet." This inspired him to design a better way to keep clubs off the ground.
The patent-pending HANDY RAN PCS keeps golf clubs off the ground when a cart or golf bag isn’t nearby. This prevents the clubs from getting wet and/or dirty. It also provides a place to hold an umbrella and cigarettes or cigars. In addition, it eases divot repair and ball marking. Overall, it promotes convenience.
The original design was submitted to the Racine office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-RGL-103, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
